EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited! The Connected Helicopter at Heli-Expo 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THE CONNECTED HELICOPTER AT HELI-EXPO 2020 Please join us... DATE Wed, January 29, 2020 TIME 2:45 p.m. â€“ 3:45 p.m. PST LOCATION Heli-Expo 2020 Anaheim Convention Center Room 207C Join us for a look into the connected helicopter with speakers:
- Pat Nuanez with HUMS Products, Honeywell - Eric Jazak with DSI - Iain Ronis with Sky Connect Tracker Systems, Honeywell - Travis Boyer with Sky Connect Tracker Systems, MASCO - Pete Henrikson with Truth Data
Learn more about the importance of the connected helicopter. Plus, get your questions answered during the panel discussion.
See you there!
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
